entry.title: Hi there.
entry.content:
Hi there!

I’m Ryan, also known as Raito Bezarius over Internet 1.

I am not too good with lengthy self-introduction or captivating and engaging description of what I do.

Otherwise, I am one of these tech guys who wants to share more about what they are thinking. Anyway. I hope this blog will be helpful for you and everyone and I hope that it’ll convince you to start a blog, yes, you!

El Psy Congroo, Ryan.

  1. There will be a post about the why before, the how, and the why after I have this “Raito Bezarius” nickname following me since 2013.↩
entry.summary:
Hi there!

I’m Ryan, also known as Raito Bezarius
